source: 系统方法研究家庭和健康应该把握住复杂的网络 ，在这个网络里家庭成员都交织在一起，这个网络包括了多重家庭关系和更大的保健系统。
target: A systems approach to studying family and health should embrace a complex network in which family members are intertwined and that incorporates multiple family relationships and a larger health care system.

source: 本文对家庭和成人健康相关文献进行系统性研究，72篇筛选出的文章依次按照主题进行解码，找到这个领域内的主要核心主题。
target: In this systematic search of family and adult health-related literature, 72 screened articles were sequentially decoded thematically, finding major core themes within this field.

source: 结果表明有六大主题，其包括：家庭关系质量，家庭结构，健康和保健方面的行为因素，心理身体调节因素，看护情况，和老年人健康。
target: The results indicated that there were six major themes, which included: the quality of family relationships, family structure, behavioral factors in terms of health and health care, psychophysical adjustment factors, caregiving situations, and elderly health.

source: 研究结果支持在成人健康方面的研究中较少得到代表的家庭成员，而不仅仅是亲密伴侣。
target: Findings support less represented family members in studies of adult health than close partners alone.

target_errors.term: Findings support less represented family members in studies of adult health than close partners alone.

source: 但是，聚焦于成人家庭成员的家庭和健康相关研究很多都只关注亲密关系，也就是婚姻关系。
target: However, much of the family and health-related research that focuses on adult family members focuses only on intimacy, that is, marital relationships.

source: 成人维护的有强大影响力的家庭关系中还有很多其他的关系都被忽视了，而且随着年龄变大，越会对亲密关系更关注。
target: There are many other relationships that have been overlooked in the strong family relationships maintained by adults, and the greater the concern for intimacy as they get older.

source: 信号通路中风险基因的构成可能可以解释酒精依赖风险基因协同的神经生物学作用。
target: The constitution of risk genes in signaling pathways may potentially explain the synergistic neurobiological effects of alcohol dependence risk genes.

target_errors.term: synergistic neurobiological effects of alcohol dependence risk genes.

source: 识别酒精依赖的风险基因和风险基因通路。
target: Identification of risk genes and risk gene pathways for alcohol dependence.

target_errors.term: Identification of risk genes and risk gene pathways for alcohol dependence.

source: 我们采用基因富集 (gene-set-rich) 分析方法对酒精依赖进行了基于通路的全基因组关联分析 (GWAS)。
target: We performed a pathway based genome-wide association study (GWAS) for alcohol dependence using gene set rich analysis.

source: 在包括1409名欧裔美国人(European-American，EA)酒精依赖者和1518 名EA健康对照者的探索性样本人群中检测了近一百万个基因标志物。
target: Nearly one million genetic markers were examined in an exploratory sample population comprising 1409 European American (EA) alcohol dependent individuals and 1518 EA healthy controls.

source: 此外，将681名非裔美国人 (African-American, AA) 病例和508名AA健康受试者作为重测样本。
target: In addition, 681 African American (African American, AA) cases and 508 AA healthy subjects were included as test-retest samples.

source: 我们发现了几个与酒精依赖显著相关的可重复的全基因组风险基因和风险通路。
target: We found several reproducible genome-wide risk genes and risk pathways significantly associated with alcohol dependence.

source: 在多重比较Bonferroni校正后，“细胞- 细胞外基质相互作用”通路(EA样本中 一些基因和生物信号传导过程可能与酒精依赖的风险相关，本研究的发现为此提供了新的证据。
target: After Bonferroni correction for multiple comparisons, "" cell extracellular matrix interaction "" pathways (some genes and biological signaling processes may be associated with the risk of alcohol dependence in EA samples, and the findings of the present study provide novel evidence for this.

target_errors.term: After Bonferroni correction for multiple comparisons,

source: 李-佛美尼综合症是一种遗传性的疾病，大概一生中有90%的患癌几率，它要求家庭成员终身接受综合性癌症筛查。
target: Li Fraumeni syndrome, an inherited disorder with an approximate 90% chance of developing cancer in a lifetime, requires family members to receive comprehensive cancer screening throughout life.

source: 本文研究医疗保健对管理李-佛美尼综合症风险和治疗过程中所起的作用，这些风险和治疗均由家长，青少年和成年孩子们来承担着。
target: This article examines the role that health care plays in managing the risks and treatment of Li Fraumeni syndrome, which are borne by parents, adolescents, and adult children.

target_errors.term: This article examines the role that health care plays in managing the risks and treatment of Li Fraumeni syndrome, which are borne by parents, adolescents, and adult children.

source: 参与研究的家庭有23个，采用半结构化的访谈。
target: Twenty three families participated in the study, using semi-structured interviews.

target_errors.term: Twenty three families participated in the study, using semi-structured interviews.

source: 家庭的组成有2-5个家庭成员，每个家庭的较年轻一代人年龄跨度7-40岁。
target: The composition of the families consisted of 2-5 family members, with the younger generation of each family spanning ages 7-40 years.

target_errors.term: The composition of the families consisted of 2-5 family members,

source: 使用草根理论方法，我们针对访谈文稿进行了开放式和集中式解码。
target: Using grass root theory methodology, we developed open-ended and centralized decoding of the interview contributions.

source: 家庭成员描述了健康领袖的作用在家庭内如何实现的，还有孩子的成熟，某家庭成员的去世等因素，这些因素都决定了谁承担了什么角色，这些角色在一段时间范围内如何发生变化。
target: Family members describe how the role of a health leader is fulfilled within the family, but also the maturation of children, the death of a certain family member, and other factors that all determine who has undertaken what roles, and how these roles have changed over time.

source: 他们通常会表达集体性的共同责任，帮助亲戚理解LFS症和实施合适的癌症风险管理。
target: They often express collective shared responsibility to help relatives understand LFS and implement appropriate cancer risk management.

source: 家庭成员通过陪同一起去就医来给与支持以及信息搜集的方式来实现他们的健康作用。
target: Family members met their health role through accompanying visits to medical attention for support and information gathering.

target_errors.term: through accompanying visits to medical attention for

source: 那些可以适应家庭角色动态变化的供给方可以较好地实现亲戚的社会心理和医疗的需要，主要是通过尽力理解承受LFS影响的家庭系统的功能，促进家庭成员们彼此的支持。
target: Those providers who can adapt to the dynamic changes in family roles can better fulfill relatives' psychosocial and medical needs, mainly by trying their best to understand the functioning of the family system that bears the impact of LFS, facilitating family members to support each other.

target_errors.term: system that bears the impact of LFS,

source: 健康领袖的作用是代际间的，提供了必要的支持给家庭，特别是在复杂的医疗保健方面的决定。
target: The role of a health leader is intergenerational, providing the necessary support to families, particularly in complex health care decisions.

source: 我们的研究结果提供了健康医疗供给方的看法，主要是关于LFS病人和他们的亲戚如何作出特殊的医疗决策和发挥照料者的角色，这些都深受LFS遗传性特性的影响，和这些角色如何随着时间而发生变化。
target: Our findings provide perspectives on health care providers, mainly on how LFS patients and their relatives make special medical decisions and play the roles of caregivers, which are deeply influenced by the hereditary nature of LFS, and how these roles have changed over time.

source: 该论文描述了一项源自美国的循证干预措施在乌干达的国情下如何尽可能优化并保持原有效度的调适过程。
target: The paper describes an adaptation process for an evidence-based intervention originating from the United States to optimize and maintain original validity when possible under Uganda's national conditions.

source: 研究过程涉及以下方面：初期组织校长和老师参加集会，介绍本研究的内容和干预措施的主要概念；在起始阶段组织乌干达团队对4Rs和2Ss相关内容进行了整体学习；邀请社区利益相关者积极参与并针对干预措施的内容和文化相关性提供更多的反馈；指导手册的最终修订版；收集儿童的绘画作品，以供编辑手册时使用。
target: The research process involved the following: participation of initial organizational principals and teachers at meetings to introduce the main concepts of the content and interventions of this study;Organizing Ugandan teams in the initiation phase integrated learning on 4Rs - and 2SS related content;Community stakeholders are invited to participate actively and provide more feedback on the content and cultural relevance of interventions;Final revision of the instruction manual;Children's drawings were collected for use when editing manuals.

target_errors.term: participation of initial organizational principals and teachers at meetings to introduce the main concepts of the content and interventions of this study

source: 本文描述了原有干预措施和调整后的干预方案在内容方面以及实施方法上的异同。
target: This paper describes the original interventions and the adapted intervention program in terms of content as well as similarities and differences in implementation methods.

target_errors.term: This paper describes the original interventions and the adapted intervention program in terms of content as well as similarities and differences in implementation methods

source: 研究结果还强调了让社区利益相关者参与调适修改过程的重要性。
target: The findings also highlight the importance of involving community stakeholders in the process of accommodating modification.

source: 在乌干达，每五个儿童中就有一个孩子存在这样或那样的心理健康问题，其中包括破坏性行为障碍(DBDs )。
target: In Uganda, one in every five children has such or such mental health problems, which include disruptive behavior disorders (DBDs).

source: DBDs 可以持续到成年期，带来诸多不良后果。
target: DBDs can persist into adulthood with numerous adverse consequences.

source: 在发达国家的高度贫困社区，针对DBDs的有效干预措施已经得到开发和测试。
target: Effective interventions targeting DBDs have been developed and tested in highly deprived communities in developed countries.

source: 但是在乌干达这样的大多数非洲国家，相关的干预措施仍属罕见。
target: But in most African countries like Uganda, relevant interventions remain rare.

source: 作为一项随机测试的部分内容，本文调查研究了乌干达的30所学校中表现出行为问题的青少年及其他们的照顾者。
target: As part of a randomized test, this paper surveys adolescents presenting with behavioral problems and their caregivers from 30 schools in Uganda.

source: 本研究旨在验证以下假设,即父母对孩童应对能力的培养(SOC)与孩子的情绪调节能力之间的关系是长期的。
target: This study was designed to test the hypothesis that the relationship between the parent's nurturing of the child's coping abilities (SOC) and the child's emotion regulation abilities is long-term.

target_errors.term: parent's nurturing of the child's coping abilities (SOC)

source: 纵向性的结构方程模型(SEM)分析的结果表明,在基线测量的父母SOC预测了孩子12个月后测量到的在情绪调节方面的适应和调适不良的结果。
target: The results of the structural equation modeling (SEM) analysis of longitudinally indicated that parental SOC measured at baseline predicted the outcomes of maladaptation and maladaptation in emotion regulation measured 12 months after the child.

source: 更具体地说,父母的积极培养孩子应对策略方面的建议预测了孩子情绪调节方面的适应性,而父母缺乏对孩童应对能力的培养则预测了孩子在情绪调节方面的不良调适能力。
target: More specifically, the parent's suggestion of positively nurturing aspects of the child's coping strategies predicted resilience in the child's emotion regulation, while the parent's lack of nurturing of the child's coping skills predicted poor resilience in the child's emotion regulation dimension.

target_errors.term: the parent's suggestion of positively nurturing aspects of the child's coping strategies

source: 样本来自256位父母,其孩子年龄在5至12岁之间(儿童平均年龄= 8.36,SD = 2.03,男性54.7%;父母平均年龄= 34.49,SD = 6.20,女性59%)。
target: Samples were from 256 parents whose children were between 5 and 12 years of age (child mean age = 8.36, SD = 2.03, 54.7% male;Parental mean age = 34.49, SD = 6.20, 59% female).

source: 参与者被要求在起始阶段和12个月时填写在线问卷,以供收集有关人口统计学信息,育儿行为和儿童情绪调节能力方面的数据。
target: Participants were asked to complete an online questionnaire at initiation and at 12 months for collection of data on demographic information, parenting behaviors, and children's emotion regulation abilities.

source: 此外,在家长积极培养应对策略与儿童情绪调节适应性之间的纵向联系中,儿童性别起了调节作用:尽管这种联系很小,对女孩来说相对微小,而对于男孩则较大,并且具有统计学的显著意义。
target: In addition, child gender played a moderating role in the longitudinal association between parents' positively developing coping strategies and children's emotion regulation adaptations: Although this association was small, relatively small for girls and larger, and statistically significant, for boys.

source: 本项研究结果强调了家长的SOC的重要性,因为它有可能提高5至12岁儿童的情绪调节能力。
target: The present findings highlight the importance of SOC for parents because of its potential to improve emotion regulation for children between 5 and 12 years of age.

source: 同时，多群组分析表明，在妊娠期间与父母同住的受试组中，与对方父母的冲突会引发婚内问题；而不与父母同住的受试组中，在怀孕后期到产后期，与对方父亲之间的关系冲突可能强化婚姻问题。
target: Meanwhile, multi cohort analysis indicated that intra marital problems were induced by conflicts with opposite parents in the group of subjects who lived with their parents during pregnancy;Whereas in the group of subjects not living with their parents, a conflict in the relationship with each other's father during late pregnancy to the postpartum period may have strengthened marital problems.

target_errors.term: multi cohort analysis indicated that intra marital problems were induced by conflicts with opposite parents in the group of subjects who lived with their parents during pregnancy;Whereas

source: 本研究旨在探索（1）过渡为家长期间，夫妻婚姻关系和与对方父母的冲突两者之间的双向关联性，以及（2）和父亲同住对上述关系的调适影响作用。
target: This study aimed to explore (1) the bidirectional association between the transition to parenthood, the couple's marital relationship, and conflict with each other's parents, and (2) the moderating effect of living with fathers on the above relationships.

target_errors.term: between the transition to parenthood, the couple's marital relationship, and conflict with each other's parents

source: 过渡到为人父母的时期是新任父母们面临的最紧张的调适期之一，无论是与个体自我的关系还是与他者的关系。
target: The transition to parenthood is one of the most stressful accommodations facing newly appointed parents, both in relation to the individual's self and to others.

source: 针对这种过渡时期的代际关系之间的双向关联的研究非常有限，而且相互关系的复杂性也会根据生活居住情境的不同而变化。
target: Studies addressing the bidirectional associations between intergenerational relationships in this transitional period are very limited, and the complexity of the interrelationships varies depending on the living situation of residence.

source: 本文的研究对象是359名已婚母亲，采用了三波前瞻性长期性研究设计。
target: The subjects of this paper were 359 married mothers using a three wave prospective long-term study design.

source: 使用二元调整量表和斯特赖克调整清单量表来评估婚姻关系以及与对方父母的冲突关系。
target: The dyadic adjustment scale and the streck Adjustment Inventory scale were used to assess marital relationships and conflict relationships with each other's parents.

source: 研究相互关系时使用的是交叉时滞平面分析，确定这些关系是否随着生活情境的不同而呈现出不同的模式时使用的是多群组分析。
target: When examining interrelationships, cross time lag plane analysis was used, and multigroup analysis was used when determining whether these relationships exhibited different patterns with different life situations.

source: 两个交叉－时滞模型表明，在怀孕中期至后期，婚内问题和与对方父母的冲突之间存在着双向关系。
target: Two cross time lag models show that there is a bidirectional relationship between problems within marriage and conflicts with each other's parents during mid to late pregnancy.

source: 这些研究发现揭示了代际冲突的交叉时滞关联性。
target: These research findings reveal a cross time lag Association for intergenerational conflict.

source: 医疗保健专业人员有必要确保在过渡为父母的过程中，代际关系是积极有利的。
target: Healthcare professionals are warranted to ensure that intergenerational relationships are positively advantageous during the transition to parenthood.

source: 本研究丰富了我们对于和父亲同住这个因素对婚姻关系的作用的认知，并能指导基于特定文化的多维度干预方式的未来发展。
target: This study enriches our perception of the role of living with fathers in the same place as this factor on marital relationships and can guide future development of culture based multi-dimensional intervention modalities.

source: 研究认为男子童年时期的不良经历（ACEs）和精神创伤症状与其IPV犯罪行为（亲密伴侣暴力）和被虐待经历是有关联的，但是针对暴力实施干预措施时起到阻碍作用的几个重要方面尚未得到深入研究。
target: Research has linked men's childhood adverse experiences (ACES) and psychotraumatic symptoms to their experiences of IPV crime (intimate partner violence) and abuse, but several important aspects that play a blocking role when interventions are implemented for violence have not been studied in depth.

source: 研究认为男子童年时期的不良经历（ACEs）和精神创伤症状与其IPV犯罪行为（亲密伴侣暴力）和被虐待经历是有关联的，但是针对暴力实施干预措施时起到阻碍作用的几个重要方面尚未得到深入研究。
target: Research has linked men's childhood adverse experiences (ACES) and psychotraumatic symptoms to their experiences of IPV crime (intimate partner violence) and abuse, but several important aspects that play a blocking role when interventions are implemented for violence have not been studied in depth.

source: 此外，大多数研究只侧重于男性在身体方面的 IPV 犯罪行为，很少聚焦于诸如其他类型的 IPV行为、暴力严重程度或男性受迫害等研究方向。
target: In addition, most studies have focused only on males' IPV criminal behaviour in the physical context and few have focused on research directions such as other types of IPV behaviour, severity of violence or male persecution.

source: 另外，很少有研究关注基于ACE框架的可能性保护因素，例如临床人群的觉知行为。
target: In addition, few studies have focused on likelihood protective factors based on the ACE framework, such as perceptual behavior in clinical populations.

source: 最后，大多数研究的对象还尚未关注到有色人种，尽管一些种族/少数民族群体对IPV的接触率比较高。
target: Finally, the majority of the subjects studied have not yet focused on Coloureds, although some racial / ethnic minority groups have relatively high exposure rates to IPV.

target_errors.term: the majority of the subjects studied have not yet focused on Coloureds,

source: 基于以上原因，本研究调查了IPV的发生频率和严重程度（心理、身体、伤害）与ACES、PTSD、创伤症状学（与PTSD区别开来），还有觉知的自我效能之间的相互关联。
target: For the above reasons, this study investigated the interrelationship between the frequency and severity (psychological, physical, injuries) of IPV and aces, PTSD, trauma symptomatology (distinguished from PTSD), but also perceived self-efficacy.

The sample was from 67 men of color, mostly of low income, who were participating in an intervention program for abusive gamut behaviors.

source: 基于以上原因，本研究调查了IPV的发生频率和严重程度（心理、身体、伤害）与ACES、PTSD、创伤症状学（与PTSD区别开来），还有觉知的自我效能之间的相互关联。
target: For the above reasons, this study investigated the interrelationship between the frequency and severity (psychological, physical, injuries) of IPV and aces, PTSD, trauma symptomatology (distinguished from PTSD), but also perceived self-efficacy.

source: 基于以上原因，本研究调查了IPV的发生频率和严重程度（心理、身体、伤害）与ACES、PTSD、创伤症状学（与PTSD区别开来），还有觉知的自我效能之间的相互关联。
target: For the above reasons, this study investigated the interrelationship between the frequency and severity (psychological, physical, injuries) of IPV and aces, PTSD, trauma symptomatology (distinguished from PTSD), but also perceived self-efficacy.

target_errors.term: Higher ace scores predicted higher rates of self-reported IPV crime and higher proportions of victimization for nearly all types.

source: PTSD 症状和复杂性创伤症状的严重程度综合在一起解释了 13% 到 40% 的 IPV 结果，而且每种结果都与某些类型的自报 的IPV 受害和暴力实施频率和严重程度有独特的关联性。
target: PTSD symptoms and the severity of complex traumatic symptoms combined explain 13% to 40% of IPV outcomes, and each outcome is uniquely associated with certain types of self-reported IPV victimization and the frequency and severity of violent implementation.

source: 本研究综述了针对非主流的边缘化男性群体所采取的相关临床措施，包括筛查、培训和可能采用的治疗性干预方法。
target: This study reviews relevant clinical measures undertaken for a non mainstream, marginalised male population, including screening, training and possible therapeutic intervention approaches.

source: 本系统综述考查了欧洲寻求庇护者和难民人群移民后变量对其心理健康的影响。
target: This systematic review examines the effect of post immigration variables on the mental health of European asylum seekers and refugee populations.

source: 它主要关注移民后应激源的影响 (包括庇护过程的时长和停留时间, 居住状态和社会融合) 以及它们对创伤后压力障碍, 焦虑和抑郁的影响。
target: It mainly focuses on the effects of post-migratory stressors (including length and length of stay in sheltered procedures, residential status and social integration) and their effects on post-traumatic stress disorder, anxiety and depression.

target_errors.term: length and length of stay in sheltered procedures

source: 本研究综述了22个研究。
target: Twenty two studies were reviewed in this review.

source: 在22项研究中的9项中, 庇护过程的时长和停留时间被发现是最常被提及的心理健康困难因素。
target: In 9 of the 22 studies, the length of sheltered work and length of stay were found to be the most frequently cited mental health difficulties factors.

source: 在污染源不变的情况下,有效通风决定了空气质量的优劣。

target: Therefore, establishing a quantitative determination index of effective ventilation, and using this indicator to carry out real-time evaluation of air quality in specific areas, leading residents to choose healthy outdoor active sites becomes an urgent problem to solve.

target: On this basis, wind field simulations and air quality evaluations were conducted in different periods of urban square space with the help of real-time meteorological data.

target: The concentrations of airborne pollutants and pathogenic bacteria directly affect human health.

source: 本研究采用雷诺平均Navier-Stokes(RANS)方法建立了基于计算流体力学(CFD)技术的城市空气污染模拟系统,研究了风速、污染物浓度和污染物扩散效率之间的关系。
target: In this study, Reynolds averaged Navier Stokes (RANS) method was used to establish an urban air pollution simulation system based on computational fluid dynamics (CFD) technique to investigate the relationship between wind speed, pollutant concentration and pollutant diffusion efficiency.

source: 摘要: 角膜墨染术 (Corneal keratopigmentation KTP) 在治疗角膜混浊的患者有着悠久的历史。
target: Abstract: corneal inking (corneal keratopigmentation KTP) has a long history in the treatment of patients with corneal clouding.

source: 本文阐述了KTP在美容和功能方面的临床应用, 并讨论了KTP的手术效果及其在实验和组织病理学研究中的特点。
target: This article illustrates the clinical application of KTP in cosmesis and function, and discusses the surgical effects of KTP and its characteristics in experimental and histopathological studies.

source: 由于KTP手术技术的更新与改进以及其并发症的低发生率, 因此通常被考虑用于治疗性或功能性适应症的患者。
target: Because of the updates and improvements in the surgical technique of KTP and the low incidence of its complications, it is often considered for patients with therapeutic or functional indications.

source: 在乌干达，每五个儿童中就有一个孩子存在这样或那样的心理健康问题，其中包括破坏性行为障碍(DBDs )。
target: In Uganda, one in every five children has such or such mental health problems, which include disruptive behavior disorders (DBDs).

source: 在发达国家的高度贫困社区，针对DBDs的有效干预措施已经得到开发和测试。
target: Effective interventions targeting DBDs have been developed and tested in highly deprived communities in developed countries.

source: 该论文描述了一项源自美国的循证干预措施在乌干达的国情下如何尽可能优化并保持原有效度的调适过程。
target: The paper describes an adaptation process for an evidence-based intervention originating from the United States to optimize and maintain original validity when possible under Uganda's national conditions.

source: 研究过程涉及以下方面：初期组织校长和老师参加集会，介绍本研究的内容和干预措施的主要概念；在起始阶段组织乌干达团队对4Rs和2Ss相关内容进行了整体学习；邀请社区利益相关者积极参与并针对干预措施的内容和文化相关性提供更多的反馈；指导手册的最终修订版；收集儿童的绘画作品，以供编辑手册时使用。
target: The research process involved the following: participation of initial organizational principals and teachers at meetings to introduce the main concepts of the content and interventions of this study;Organizing Ugandan teams in the initiation phase integrated learning on 4Rs - and 2SS related content;Community stakeholders are invited to participate actively and provide more feedback on the content and cultural relevance of interventions;Final revision of the instruction manual;Children's drawings were collected for use when editing manuals.

integrated learning on 4Rs - and 2SS related content;Community

source: 本文描述了原有干预措施和调整后的干预方案在内容方面以及实施方法上的异同。
target: This paper describes the original interventions and the adapted intervention program in terms of content as well as similarities and differences in implementation methods.

source: DBDs 可以持续到成年期，带来诸多不良后果。
target: DBDs can persist into adulthood with numerous adverse consequences.

source: 但是在乌干达这样的大多数非洲国家，相关的干预措施仍属罕见。
target: But in most African countries like Uganda, relevant interventions remain rare.

source: 作为一项随机测试的部分内容，本文调查研究了乌干达的30所学校中表现出行为问题的青少年及其他们的照顾者。
target: As part of a randomized test, this paper surveys adolescents presenting with behavioral problems and their caregivers from 30 schools in Uganda.

source: 研究结果还强调了让社区利益相关者参与调适修改过程的重要性。
target: The findings also highlight the importance of involving community stakeholders in the process of accommodating modification.

source: 成人维护的有强大影响力的家庭关系中还有很多其他的关系都被忽视了，而且随着年龄变大，越会对亲密关系更关注。
target: There are many other relationships that have been overlooked in the strong family relationships maintained by adults, and the greater the concern for intimacy as they get older.

source: 本文对家庭和成人健康相关文献进行系统性研究，72篇筛选出的文章依次按照主题进行解码，找到这个领域内的主要核心主题。
target: In this systematic search of family and adult health-related literature, 72 screened articles were sequentially decoded thematically, finding major core themes within this field.

source: 研究结果支持在成人健康方面的研究中较少得到代表的家庭成员，而不仅仅是亲密伴侣。
target: Findings support less represented family members in studies of adult health than close partners alone.

source: 系统方法研究家庭和健康应该把握住复杂的网络 ，在这个网络里家庭成员都交织在一起，这个网络包括了多重家庭关系和更大的保健系统。
target: A systems approach to studying family and health should embrace a complex network in which family members are intertwined and that incorporates multiple family relationships and a larger health care system.

source: 但是，聚焦于成人家庭成员的家庭和健康相关研究很多都只关注亲密关系，也就是婚姻关系。
target: However, much of the family and health-related research that focuses on adult family members focuses only on intimacy, that is, marital relationships.

source: 结果表明有六大主题，其包括：家庭关系质量，家庭结构，健康和保健方面的行为因素，心理身体调节因素，看护情况，和老年人健康。
target: The results indicated that there were six major themes, which included: the quality of family relationships, family structure, behavioral factors in terms of health and health care, psychophysical adjustment factors, caregiving situations, and elderly health.

source: 细胞焦亡是一种依赖半胱氨酸天冬氨酸蛋白酶（Caspase-1/4/5/11）的程序性死亡方式，主要特征是炎症小体激活，细胞膜破裂，形成孔洞，细胞内容物释放。
target: Pyroptosis is a caspase (caspase-1 / 4 / 5 / 11) - dependent programmed death modality mainly characterized by inflammasome activation, rupture of the cell membrane, pore formation, and release of cellular contents.

source: 细胞焦亡作为一种新型的细胞死亡方式广泛参与呼吸系统的疾病，如肺纤维化、急性肺损伤/呼吸窘迫综合征、支气管发育不良、慢性阻塞性肺疾病和哮喘等。
target: As a novel cell death modality, pyroptosis is widely involved in respiratory diseases, such as pulmonary fibrosis, acute lung injury / respiratory distress syndrome, bronchial dysplasia, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, and asthma.

source: 本文综述细胞焦亡的发生机制以及在不同呼吸系统疾病中的作用，以期为呼吸系统疾病的治疗提供新思路。
target: This review focuses on the mechanism of pyroptosis and its role in different respiratory diseases, with a view to providing new ideas for the treatment of respiratory diseases.

source: 目的 利用2100生物分析仪结合蛋白芯片获取死后大鼠肝组织蛋白质表达谱，推测其与死亡时间的关系。
target: Objective to obtain protein expression profiles of postmortem rat liver tissues using the 2100 Bioanalyzer combined with protein chip, and to speculate the relationship with postmortem interval.

source: 方法 大鼠腹腔麻醉致死后置于16 ℃环境中，提取死后14个时间点肝组织中的水溶性蛋白质，使用蛋白芯片获取相对分子质量在14 000~230 000的蛋白质表达谱数据，并利用主成分分析（principal component analysis，PCA）、偏最小二乘-判别分析（partial least squares-discriminant analysis，PLS-DA）、Fisher判别对数据进行分析。

source: 全面阅读并总结近年国内外关于 TKA 及 THA 的 PBM 措施的进展，结合四川大学华西医院临床实践经验，从优化造血、减少失血和输血三方面深入评价并分析各种措施的优劣，为临床选择提供依据。
target: To comprehensively read and summarize the progress of PBM measures for TKA and THA at home and abroad, together with the clinical experience of West China Hospital of Sichuan University, the analysis of the advantages and disadvantages of various measures were evaluated from three aspects, including optimizing hematopoiesis, reducing blood loss and blood transfusion, which could provide a basis for clinical selection.

source: 目前用于 TKA 及 THA 的 PBM 方式较多，其中优化造血主要包括围术期应用铁剂及促红细胞生成素；减少失血措施包括使用止血带、术中进行控制性降压及围术期应用抗纤溶药物；自体输血主要包括预存自体输血、血液稀释法自体输血以及术中自体血液回输；而异体输血则为治疗贫血的最终手段。
target: There are many PBM methods for TKA and THA, among which the optimization of hematopoiesis mainly includes the application of perioperative iron and erythropoietin. Measures to reduce bleeding include the use of tourniquet, intraoperative controlled hypotension, perioperative administration of antifibrinolytic agents. Autotransfusion mainly includes preoperative autotransfusion, autotransfusion with hemodilution and intraoperative autologous blood reinfusion. Allogeneic blood transfusion is the ultimate treatment for anemia.

source: 研究急性早幼粒细胞白血病（APL）患者呼气成分中的挥发性有机化合物（VOC）特征，探讨VOC用于APL诊断及疗效评估的可行性. 以APL患者和健康人为研究对象，采用SPME-GC/MS技术检测受试者呼出气体中的VOC；比较分析APL初诊组、复发组、缓解组和健康组呼气中的VOC成分，使用Kruskal-Wallis方差分析APL不同疾病状态组特征性VOC差异并应用Dunn-Bonferroni检验进行两两比较. 初诊APL患者的二甲基硫醚、甲苯和十二烷值明显高于健康人，而乙醇、正己烷和苯甲醛值明显低于健康人（P<0.05）。
target: To investigate the volatile organic compound (VOC) profiles in the exhaled breath fractions of acute promyelocytic leukemia (APL) patients, and to explore the feasibility of VOCs for APL diagnosis and efficacy assessment. We used SPME-GC / MS to detect VOCs in the exhaled breath of subjects with APL and healthy subjects;In a comparative analysis of the VOC components in the exhaled breath of patients with APL in the initial diagnosis group, the relapse group, the remission group, and the healthy group, the differences in the VOCs characteristic of the different disease states groups of APL were analyzed by using the Kruskal Wallis variance test and applying the Dunn Bonferroni test for pairwise comparisons. 41,42 the values of dimethyl sulfide, toluene, and decadiene were significantly higher in patients with newly diagnosed APL than in healthy subjects, whereas the values of ethanol, ethanol, ethanol, andN-hexane and benzaldehyde values were significantly lower than in healthy subjects (P < 0.05).

target: Early phase clinical trials (including first in human trials) focus on the selection of subjects, study design, choice of dose and mode of administration, dose escalation, monitoring of adverse events / reactions (tolerability evaluation), observation and reporting procedures, and criteria for subjects to continue dosing and discontinue dosing.

source: 根据国内外有关文献，并结合作者早期临床研究的实践经验,简要介绍CHB创新性药物临床试验设计中应关注的临床问题。
target: Based on relevant literatures at home and abroad, and combined with the author's practical experience of early clinical studies, a brief introduction is given to the clinical issues that should be concerned in the design of clinical trials of innovative drugs for CHB.

source: 精神卫生问题的发生、发展及对其管理都需要相对较长的时间，所以相当一部分精神病学研究—— 特别是能够明确回答有关生物、心理和社会因素复杂的相互作用的研究——要求对患者及其生活环境进行跨时长久的多种评估。
target: The onset, progression and management of mental health problems take a relatively long time, so a significant proportion of psychiatric research - particularly one that can definitively answer the complex interplay of biological, psychological and social factors - requires multiple assessments over time for patients and their living environments.

source: 本文就纵向数据分析的话题做了介绍。
target: This article provides an introduction to the topic of longitudinal data analysis.

source: 然而，许多精神病学的研究人员使用不正确的统计方法来分析这一类型的纵向数据，这一问题会导致分析结果中出现无法识别的偏倚而由此得出不正确的结论。
target: However, many researchers in psychiatry use incorrect statistical methods for the analysis of this type of longitudinal data, a problem that leads to unrecognized bias in the results of the analysis and thus incorrect conclusions.

source: 在对14项明确提及儿童的国际创伤治疗指导文件综述的基础上, 我们对这些指南可以变得更具包容性和公平性的两个领域进行了反思; a) 儿童文化背景的体现, b) 儿童表达其声音的机会。
target: On the basis of a review of 14 international trauma treatment guidance documents that explicitly mention children, we reflect on two areas in which these guidelines can become more inclusive and equitable;a) The embodiment of a child's cultural background, and b) the opportunity for the child to express his or her voice.

target_errors.term: the opportunity for the child to express his or her voice.

target: Although several guidelines mention that treatment should be tailored to the cultural needs of the child, there is little guidance on how this can be achieved.

source: 人工智能是在电子计算机技术基础上迅速发展起来的科学技术，已应用于人类社会的许多方面，在医学领域的应用也越来越广泛，人工智能在口腔医学领域的发展和应用可在一定程度上引领口腔医学的未来。
target: AI, a science and technology developed rapidly on the basis of electronic computer technology, has been applied to many aspects of the human society, and is becoming more widely used in medicine, and the development and application of AI in oral medicine can lead the future of oral medicine to some extent.

source: 口腔医学专业人员需要认知、学习和掌握人工智能技术，紧跟医疗新时代的步伐并在医疗实践中开展应用。
target: Oral medicine professionals need to recognize, learn, and master AI technology, closely following the pace of the new era of medicine and developing applications in medical practice.

source: 本文就人工智能在口腔医疗、科研、教学中的应用及研究作一介绍，并对人工智能在口腔医学领域的发展进行展望。
target: This article is an introduction to the use and research of AI in oral medicine, scientific research, teaching, and technology, as well as an outlook on the development of AI in oral medicine.

source: 本文采用虚拟和实际数据来阐述这个非常有用的处理 离散值的回归方法，并与采用经典回归模型和半参数 回归模型所得出的结果进行比较。

source: 通过分析主题内容确定了加强初级保健体系的备选方案。
target: Alternatives for strengthening the primary care system were identified by analysis of the subject content.

source: 我们发现：(I) 尽管非传染性疾病负担日益沉重，但许多中低收入国家仍缺乏预防服务资金；(ii) 社区卫生工作者通常资源配备不足，无法获得良好的支持，并且缺乏相应培训；(iii) 在所研究的一半国家中，医疗自费超出卫生支出总额的 40％，不利于实现公平；(iv) 公共和私人体系分散、资金不足、腐败以及非正式员工参与不足，阻碍了健康保险计划的实施。
target: We found that: (i) despite the growing burden of noncommunicable diseases, many low- and middle-income countries lacked funds for preventive services; (ii) community health workers are often under-resourced, poorly supported, and lack the appropriate training; (iii) out-of-pocket medical expenses exceeded 40% of the total health expenditure in half of the countries studied, not conducive to equity; (iv) the fragmentation of public and private systems, underfunding, corruption, and poor engagement of informal workers prevent the implementation of health insurance plans.

source: 初级卫生保健体系的支持对于在截止 2030 年的十年中实现 UHC 至关重要。
target: Support from the primary health care system is critical to achieve UHC over the decade ending 2030.

source: 初级卫生保健为实现全民健康覆盖 (UHC) 提供了一种经济有效的途径。
target: Primary health care offers a cost-effective route to achieving universal health coverage (UHC).

source: 然而在许多中低收入国家，初级卫生保健体系非常薄弱，常常无法提供全面的以人为本的综合保健。
target: However, primary health-care systems are weak in many low- and middle-income countries and often fail to provide comprehensive people-centred integrated care.

source: 我们利用半扎根的研究方法分析了 20 个中低收入国家的初级卫生保健体系。

source: 14 个国家中，私营部门基本上不受监管。

source: 此外，服务基本私有化的国家，社区很少参与初级卫生保健。
target: Moreover, community engagement in primary health care was weak in countries where services were basically privatized.

source: 一些国家权力下放，促使其初级保健分散。
target: In some countries, the decentralization has led to the fragmentation of primary health care.

source: 当财政激励措施与法规和质量提升相结合，，并且社区参与度增强时，绩效便会有所改善。
target: Performance improves when financial incentives are combined with regulations and quality improvement, and when community engagement is enhanced.

source: 应该为初级卫生保健的决策制定提供充足的资源，并将政府在初级卫生保健方面的支出至少增加国内生产总值的 1％。
target: Adequate resources should be provided for policy-making in primary health care and government spending on primary health care should be increased by at least 1% of gross domestic product.

source: 还需要制定提升公平的融资方案，加强初级卫生保健管理的问责。
target: Developing equity-enhancing financing schemes and improving the accountability of primary health-care management is also needed.

target: A total of 26 patients with acute lung injury due to diffuse large B-cell lymphoma treated with rituximab containing chemotherapy regimens were analyzed. 1,2 the clinical characteristics, treatment, and prognosis of patients with diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (DLBCL) who developed acute lung injury after treatment with rituximab containing chemotherapy regimens were summarized and will improve understanding and guide clinical management.

target_errors.term: A total of 26 DLBCL patients treated in our institution from January 2013 to September 2018 with a rituximab containing chemotherapy regimen and presenting with acute lung injury were selected for the analysis of clinical features, imaging findings, chemotherapy course, treatment efficacy, and prognosis.

source: 患者主要临床症状为发热、咳嗽及胸闷; 其中12例患者低氧血症, 3例患者I型呼吸衰竭; 胸部CT以双肺弥漫性磨玻璃影为主要表现，部分患者合并少量胸腔积液; 发病时间主要分布在2-4个疗程, 症状出现距方案中利妥昔单抗输注时间在8-49 d; 25例患者治疗有效后日常生活无明显受限, 1例患者治疗无效死亡。
target: The main clinical symptoms of the patient were fever, cough and chest tightness;Twelve of these patients had hypoxemia and three had type I respiratory failure;Chest CT was performed with diffuse ground glass opacity in both lungs as the main manifestation, and some patients were combined with a small amount of pleural effusion;The onset time was mainly distributed over 2-4 courses, and the onset of symptoms was at 8-49 d from rituximab infusion in the protocol;25 patients had no significant limitation in daily life after effective treatment, and 1 patient died after ineffective treatment.

source: 弥漫大B细胞淋巴瘤应用含利妥昔单抗化疗方案后出现急性肺损伤早期无典型临床症状, 早期发现及早期激素治疗对取得良好治疗效果至关重要。
target: Diffuse large B-cell lymphoma presents without typical clinical symptoms in the early stage of acute lung injury after the application of rituximab containing chemotherapy regimens, and early detection and early hormone therapy are crucial to achieve good therapeutic results.
